venue.address_1: 45 South Main St., Suite 100, West Hartford, CT 06107
venue.name: Wu Healing Center

item.description: Sacred Alignment takes Vibrational Holographic Sound Healing to an entirely new level. This is A POWERFUL meditative journey using sacred sounds from crystal bowls, music, vocal toning and percussion along with Reiki and Shamanic tools to help the individuals in the group release that which no longer serves them. Tala and Janet are both certified Holographic Sound Healers. Please bring what you need to lay down comfortably, pillows, mats, blankets, or even folding chairs; bring drinking water for yourself. This amazing group healing session is only $15 per person."
item.how_to_find_us: next to D&D on South Main St. West Hartford. Park for free in our lot.
item.name: Holographic Sound Healing
